channel.title: Comments on: Croquembouche (Piece MontÃ©e) – Daring Bakers Challenge May 2010

item.title: By: Chris McAlonan
item.dc:creator: Chris McAlonan
item.description: I made one of these with a difference for a mid-winter xmas dinner we had for our neighbours. Each profiterole was filled with creme patissiere which had finely minced xmas fruit mince and brandy (of course) added to give a festive air. The tower was held together with chocolate instead of caramel glaze
item.content:encoded: I made one of these with a difference for a mid-winter xmas dinner we had for our neighbours. Each profiterole was filled with creme patissiere which had finely minced xmas fruit mince and brandy (of course) added to give a festive air. The tower was held together with chocolate instead of caramel glaze

item.title: By: Michele Mircev
item.dc:creator: Michele Mircev
item.description:
Hi
i need some advice please. I am making a croquembouche that contains 60 profiteroles filled with custard. The party starts at 7.3pm and they should be giving out the cake at about 10.00-10.30pm.
How long before I should assemble the croquembouche. I don't want it to collapse. How long can it stand before collapsing.
I really would appreciate your advice.
With Kindest Regards
Michele
item.content:encoded:
Hi

i need some advice please. I am making a croquembouche that contains 60 profiteroles filled with custard. The party starts at 7.3pm and they should be giving out the cake at about 10.00-10.30pm.

How long before I should assemble the croquembouche. I don’t want it to collapse. How long can it stand before collapsing.

I really would appreciate your advice.

With Kindest Regards

Michele

item.title: By: Jeanne @ CookSister!
item.dc:creator: Jeanne @ CookSister!
item.description: Oh wow - I am in love with those corskcrews! Croquembouche always terrifies me slightly so well done you for rising to the DB challenge!
item.content:encoded: Oh wow – I am in love with those corskcrews! Croquembouche always terrifies me slightly so well done you for rising to the DB challenge!

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
Pretty profiteroles with the hardened caramel! Amazing spun sugar and cute cockscrews! A beautiful overall presentation :-)
Sawadee from Bangkok, Kris
item.content:encoded:
Pretty profiteroles with the hardened caramel! Amazing spun sugar and cute cockscrews! A beautiful overall presentation ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: sweetlife
item.dc:creator: sweetlife
item.description:
great job, stunning, I love the swirls..that's what first caught my eye...
sweetlife

item.title: By: Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Hoglet K
item.description: Great job on the caramel corkscrews! I'm glad you've found a crisper choux recipe too.
item.content:encoded: Great job on the caramel corkscrews! I’m glad you’ve found a crisper choux recipe too.

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: When I saw all the posts for this month challenge starting to pop up, I immediately thought of you. You would have to be the croquembouche Queen, no? :) Looks delicious. Yeah, it's a shame all that beautiful caramel doesn't last longer, but I have the same problem.
item.content:encoded: When I saw all the posts for this month challenge starting to pop up, I immediately thought of you. You would have to be the croquembouche Queen, no? ðŸ™‚ Looks delicious. Yeah, it’s a shame all that beautiful caramel doesn’t last longer, but I have the same problem.

item.title: By: Parita
item.dc:creator: Parita
item.description: Very well done on the DB challenge! Kudos to you!
item.content:encoded: Very well done on the DB challenge! Kudos to you!

item.title: By: Michelle
item.dc:creator: Michelle
item.description: Your croquembouche is gorgeous and I love your little corkscrews! Seeing everyone's spun sugar is making me really regret not having the time to give it a try!
item.content:encoded: Your croquembouche is gorgeous and I love your little corkscrews! Seeing everyone’s spun sugar is making me really regret not having the time to give it a try!

item.title: By: Renata
item.dc:creator: Renata
item.description: Love your creations! The big one is pro! The small one is so cute with the caramel decoration!
item.content:encoded: Love your creations! The big one is pro! The small one is so cute with the caramel decoration!
